publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1932# David McLetchie: Proposed Cuts to The Scottish Regiments—That the Parliament believes that the proposed substantial cuts to the size of both the regular army and the Territorial Army will undermine the efficiency and morale of the British armed forces, damage our military capability and threaten the future of Scotland’s historic frontline regiments.

S1M-1932# David McLetchie: Proposed Cuts to The Scottish Regiments—That the Parliament believes that the proposed substantial cuts to the size of both the regular army and the Territorial Army will undermine the efficiency and morale of the British armed forces, damage our military capability and threaten the future of Scotland’s historic frontline regiments.
S1M-1932# Proposed Cuts to The Scottish Regiments (lodged on 15 May 2001) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-1932# Proposed Cuts to The Scottish Regiments (lodged on 15 May 2001) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-1932# David McLetchie: Proposed Cuts to The Scottish Regiments—That the Parliament believes that the proposed substantial cuts to the size of both the regular army and the Territorial Army will undermine the efficiency and morale of the British armed forces, damage our military capability and threaten the future of Scotland’s historic frontline regiments. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Mr Jamie McGrigor
S1M-1932# Proposed Cuts to The Scottish Regiments (lodged on 15 May 2001) Michael Russell*
